entry.summary:
Author: novasillies

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 247,629Chapters: 19/46Kudos: 123

Summary: "You're a person people are better off without."Theo's words struck hard and deep. The claws of them dug in and twisted; mangled him relentlessly."That's not on me."-Stiles goes back in time again to stop the Hale House fire. entry.title: Run
entry.summary:
Author: Ivy Posion (viletty)

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,333Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 22

Summary: She ran.She ran from her past, from her present and hopefully her future. Hoping beyond all hell that the darkness inside her didn't consume her. That the blood at her feet would stop rising.That the beast chasing at her heels would never catch her.So she ran. With no hope of rest.That is until they finally stopped her.I SUCK at summaries. It's interesting I promise. This was originally a one-shot songfic based on Danity Kane - Stay with me.

entry.title: Lay My Curses Out to Rest
entry.summary:
Author: sponfawn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,433Chapters: 10/14Kudos: 58

Summary: "Are you there, God? It's me, Stiles. Look, I know I never really went to Mass or anything like a good Polish kid but could you do me a big one and have this whole thing be entirely Not related to the supernatural - hell, it could be super cartel related but no shapeshifters, or chaos spirits, or fear monsters, or deranged Hunters, or fucking human sacrifices of any kind. Just do this for once and I'll do whatever. Well, not whatever, but I dunno I'll be a good son. You like that “honor thy father” stuff, right? I'll honor the fuck out of my dad, even come to visit more often! Confucius will weep at the intensity of my filial piety. Deal? Just. PLEASE."It's 2027 - a decade since Stiles was last in Beacon Hills - and the FBI has sent Stiles back to investigate a smuggling case.ORIn which I attempt to write the kind of story I want to read. A future Sterek fic that: 1) is in character, 2) doesn't bash any characters, 3) fixes Davis' timeline, 4) doesn't have sex, 5) has some character interactions that don't just revolve around Sterek/Stiles/Derek, and 6) addresses Derek and Stiles' unique traumas.

entry.title: The Tiger and the Wolf
entry.summary:
Author: SuperCraig96

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 117,049Chapters: 52/?Kudos: 38

Summary: Everyone in Scott's circle had already found their soulmate: Stiles with Derek, Allison with Isaac… only he was alone. Scott was happy for his friends, especially for Stiles, but he felt lonely. Every day, he stared at the two letters, the initials of his soulmate, whom he didn't know: L and A, hoping to finally meet him. (Soulmate AU)

entry.title: Just A Bit Broken
entry.summary:
Author: stereksupremacy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,049Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 34

Summary: Derek-The moment my eyes see Stiles I knew he was mine. Now it was just a matter of letting him see we were basically meant for each other. It shouldn't be too hard... Or will it? With too many obstacles between us, his brother included, is my love enough to win him over? They say love is hard, but how hard is too much? It doesn't matter. I will keep trying and trying even if it breaks me little by little. Stiles deserves love, and I will be the one to give it to him.Stiles-My life was turned upside down the day my mother got custody of me during the divorce. It's a subject we don't want to talk about. Ever. From there, things just got worse, so now. New town, new me. I won't let anyone close to me. Everyone in the end just hurts me and I don't think my heart, or my mental health can handle any more betrayals. So when Derek comes knocking on my cold, dead heart, I have to build higher and stronger walls. Because truth be told, I don't think I can keep saying no to him. But I have to. No matter how charming he is. Or how funny. Or how insanely hot he is. He'll just end up hurting me. Like him. The one who shall not be named. I'm not made for love. I learned that the hard way. Derek will have too as well.

entry.title: I knew you were trouble
entry.summary:
Author: norman123

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 81,514Chapters: 18/18Kudos: 209

Summary: Derek has never been particularly interested in Peter’s personal life, but when his uncle returns from Canada with a new "husband," he realizes—this is a disaster.Stiles is too loud, too bold, and far too good at getting in his way.Derek is certain that there’s something off about this "marriage," but the more he watches Stiles, the harder it becomes to ignore that anger isn’t the only thing he feels.What if he isn’t furious because Stiles became part of their family—but because he didn’t become part of his life?

entry.title: A Little Bit Yours
entry.summary:
Author: Blahblahblahblah9

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,632Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 110

Summary: "Oh, you poor thing, look at you,” Derek cooed, gently prying the trap apart, “So strong, aren't you, little bunny?”The bunny made a soft clucking noise when it was finally free and hummed happily. It tried to hop away but crumpled in pain. Derek scooped it up, cradling the tiny bunny in his arms. He flashed his eyes at the bunny and stroked its back when it flinched away. “Don’t worry, I won’t hurt you. I promise. I’m gonna take you to a healer so you can get all better.” or, Derek finds bunny shifter Stiles stuck in a bear trap in the woods.

entry.title: 3 times Derek touched Stiles, +1 time Stiles took the first step
entry.summary:
Author: UrNewtmas_ObsessedGirl

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,619Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 61

Summary: Stiles has been pining after Derek since, well a long time. Derek has always been a little oblivious. Stiles thought he had no chance with the wolf until Derek actually started to show interest in him. First as friends, but those touches? Those weren't just friendly. There was a meaning behind those touches. And Derek? He knew very well what he was doing to Stiles with those touches. Making a little game of it, trying to see how far he'd come.But what happens when Stiles has enough of his little game and takes matters into his own hands?

entry.title: Designation 19621
entry.summary:
Author: fanficreader5

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,067Chapters: 11/19Kudos: 412

Summary: “My designation is 19621, sir.”   Stiles stares at him.   “That's quite the mouthful. Any chance you have a, like, normal name?”   “Derek,” the cleaner says eventually. He looks at the red button on the wall and then glances away.  Stiles follows his gaze and blanches. “Dude, I’m not gonna shock you for telling me your name.”_____The new werewolf cleaner for Stiles' PhD group is grumpy and aloof and maybe a genius. As Stiles gets to know him, he can't help but wonder if there's any way to get that collar off him.

entry.title: Hello My Old Heart
entry.summary:
Author: dornessiti

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,062Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 166

Summary: Set directly after s03ep19, Derek must give Stiles a claiming bite if he wants him to survive the Letharia Vulpina injection (as well as the Nogitsune), but what is he supposed to do afterwards with this new bond that exists between them?And how will Stiles, still recovering from the events involving the Nogitsune, deal with with the fact that now he's basically werewolf married?
